original: Klinker, Karl Johan, godsägare, Laholm, f. 26/4/87 i Laholm av godsäg. Johannes Christian K. o. Anna Dellien. G. 13 m. Dagmar Bergström. Barn: Birgitta f. 14, tandl, g. m. tandl. Ake Herland, Jönköp., Marianne 16, g. m. agron. Kjell Backman, Axelvold, Våxtorp, Karl Axel 20, lant-mäst., kronoarr., Kövlinge, Hall, Elisabiet 26, g. m. förv. Robert Eklund, Hedensbergs gods, Västmanl. — Stud. v. Alnarps lantbr :sk. 07. Övertog fädernegården 13. Led. av styr. o. v. ordf. i Halmstads slakterifören. 20-41, led. av styr. f. Växjö hyp:fören., led. av hush :sällsk. förv :utsk. 20-46, ordf., i jordbr :komm. f. Hall. 1. sed. 35, i S. Hall. kraftfören. sed. 34, i S. Hall. lagerhusfören. sed. 32, v. ordf. i Sv. spannmålsfören. samorg. sed. 33, i Hall. linodhfören. sed. 39, led. av Hall. 1. egnah:nd sed. 40. RVO, Hall. 1. hush:sällsk. stGM.
translated: Klinker, Karl Johan, estate owner, Laholm, b. 26/4/87 in Laholm to estate owner Johannes Christian K. and Anna Dellien. Married on the 13th of [month] with Dagmar Bergström. Children: Birgitta b. 14, dentist, married to dentist Ake Herland, Jönköping; Marianne b. 16, married to agronomist Kjell Backman, Axelvold, Våxtorp; Karl Axel b. 20, agricultural master, crown tenant, Kövlinge, Hall; Elisabiet b. 26, married to foreman Robert Eklund, Hedensbergs estate, Västmanland. Studied at Alnarp Agricultural School in 1907. Took over the ancestral farm in 1913. Member of the board and vice chairman of Halmstad Butchery Association from 1920-1941, member of the board of Växjö Mortgage Society, member of the household society's supervisory committee from 1920-1946, chairman of the agricultural committee for Halland County since 1935, chairman of South Halland Power Association since 1934, chairman of South Halland Warehouse Association since 1932, vice chairman of the Swedish Grain Association since 1933, chairman of the Halland Linseed Association since 1939, member of Halland County's Agricultural Land Ownership since 1940. Order of Vasa Knight 1st Class, South Halland Household Society Grand Master.
